channel.title: How to use the ::setitem command on my server?
channel.description: Im wondering how to use the ::Setitem command to change an item into bones or somthing else and be able to buy the item cheap..help please ? It's p16 base by the way.

item.title: How to use the ::setitem command on my server?
item.dc:creator: @xXOwnage xXOwnage
item.description:
@xXOwnage wrote:

FOR THE LAST TIME, I DONT HAVE MY OWN SERVER…I AM NOT TRYIN TO CODE AT ALL RETARD…I AM JUST A REGULAR MEMBER ON THE SERVER AND I AM USING THE ::setitem COMMAND TO MAKE THE ITEM TURN INTO BONES…[br][size=1]Posted at: November 13, 2006, 07:37:11 PM[/size][hr]rep please ? for proving this dumbass wrong ?

item.title: How to use the ::setitem command on my server?
item.dc:creator: @CryptoScape CryptoScape
item.description:
@CryptoScape wrote:

there is no command to change item prices you need to change the item prices in the CFG FILE ITEM.CFG,the players maybe using ::item or ::freehax or just theaving at those castlewars tables?

Read full topic
